lossCodes.title: Failed to Scan
lossCodes.definition: Customer failed to scan at all, or attempted and failed at scanning item

lossCodes.title: Associate Gave Away
lossCodes.definition: Associate and/or customer have issues scanning item and Associate indicates to take the item and doesn't require item to be added to transaction

lossCodes.title: EPP Prompt
lossCodes.definition: Customer or Cashier scans item at the time that the register is processing an EPP prompt

lossCodes.title: Invalid UPC
lossCodes.definition: Customer or Cashier scans item but Invalid UPC message prompts; either that item or additional items scanned with prompt are not added to transaction

lossCodes.title: Military Verification
lossCodes.definition: Customer or Cashier scans items while Military Verification process is ongoing, and scans do not add items to transaction

lossCodes.title: MLR Loyalty Entry
lossCodes.definition: Customer or Cashier scans items while MyLowesRewards process is ongoing, and scans do not add items to transaction

lossCodes.title: Nudge Screen
lossCodes.definition: Customer or Cashier scans items while on Nudge screen, and scans do not add items to transaction

lossCodes.title: Other System Error
lossCodes.definition: Any register system error or glitch

lossCodes.title: Paint Tint
lossCodes.definition: Transaction where paint tint prompt causes loss

lossCodes.title: Pay by Scan Error
lossCodes.definition: System issue with Pay by Scan product that causes product not to ring up correctly

lossCodes.title: Pay Screen
lossCodes.definition: Customer or Cashier scans items while on Pay Screen/payment mode, and scans do not add items to transaction

lossCodes.title: Removed Item
lossCodes.definition: Customer or cashier removes item but fails to give item back to store and leaves with item

lossCodes.title: Register Reset
lossCodes.definition: Customer or Cashier scans items while register is resetting from prior customer and scan does not add to transaction

lossCodes.title: Scan with Prompt on Screen
lossCodes.definition: Customer or Cashier scans items while register has a prompt and scan does not add to transaction

lossCodes.title: Ticket Switching
lossCodes.definition: Items present are barcode-switched or one item scanned in lieu of another

lossCodes.title: Walkoff
lossCodes.definition: Customer starts transaction or scanning but takes items and leaves store without finalizing the transaction or paying

reasonCodes.title: Product Detected as Several Products
reasonCodes.definition: Long handle tools counted separately; bent items counted twice; labels or UPC counted as items

reasonCodes.title: Product Multiple Detections
reasonCodes.definition: Item counted with multiple detections

reasonCodes.title: Coffee Cup (Personal Item)
reasonCodes.definition: Disposable coffee cup

reasonCodes.title: Card Detected as Product
reasonCodes.definition: Gift cards, credit/debit cards, IDs detected as products

reasonCodes.title: Customer Brought In Matching Item
reasonCodes.definition: Customer brought in items that CV cannot distinguish from sellable items

reasonCodes.title: Accidental Pay Button Press
reasonCodes.definition: Customer or Cashier accidentally presses Pay while still scanning

reasonCodes.title: Detected Item is Not a Product
reasonCodes.definition: Cash, paint chips, paperwork or similar items

reasonCodes.title: Glare/Shadow Detected
reasonCodes.definition: Glare or shadow counted as a product

reasonCodes.title: Hand Keyed / Non-Physical Item
reasonCodes.definition: Items not physically present at register

reasonCodes.title: No Discrepancy
reasonCodes.definition: CV count matched items present

reasonCodes.title: Item Already Paid – Other Terminal
reasonCodes.definition: Customer paid at another terminal or online

reasonCodes.title: Item Already Paid – Same Terminal
reasonCodes.definition: Customer completed another transaction

reasonCodes.title: Item Detected but Not Counted
reasonCodes.definition: Item detected but not included in item count

reasonCodes.title: Item Left Behind
reasonCodes.definition: Customer left item behind or gave it to cashier

reasonCodes.title: Item Not in Transaction Area
reasonCodes.definition: Item outside transaction area

reasonCodes.title: Item Out of View of Camera
reasonCodes.definition: Item not visible to camera

reasonCodes.title: Items Sold by the Foot/Bulk
reasonCodes.definition: Item sold by length or bulk quantity

reasonCodes.title: Multiple SKUs in One Package
reasonCodes.definition: Multi-pack items counted separately

reasonCodes.title: Non-Lowe’s Personal Item
reasonCodes.definition: Personal belongings detected as items

reasonCodes.title: Other Customer’s Item – In Motion
reasonCodes.definition: Another customer’s items moving behind transaction

reasonCodes.title: Other Customer’s Item – Static
reasonCodes.definition: Another customer’s items placed in transaction area

reasonCodes.title: Recall/Suspended Transaction
reasonCodes.definition: Items already bagged or suspended

reasonCodes.title: Scan Gun Wire Detected
reasonCodes.definition: Scan gun head or wire counted as product

reasonCodes.title: Stacked Items
reasonCodes.definition: Items stacked preventing individual visibility

reasonCodes.title: Static Items in Transaction Area
reasonCodes.definition: Safety cones, receipts, brooms, etc.

reasonCodes.title: Stickers Detected as Product
reasonCodes.definition: Stickers or labels on SCO detected as items

reasonCodes.title: Unknown Reason
reasonCodes.definition: No other reason applies

reasonCodes.title: Visible Item Not Detected
reasonCodes.definition: Item visible but not identified by CV
